species.name: dudunsparce
descriptions: It drives enemies out of its nest by sucking in enough air to fill its long, narrow lungs, then releasing the air in an intense blast.
This Pok√©mon uses its hard tail to make its nest by boring holes into bedrock deep underground. The nest can reach lengths of over six miles.

abilities.name: serene-grace
abilities.effect: Doubles the chance of moves' extra effects occurring.

abilities.name: run-away
abilities.effect: Ensures success fleeing from wild battles.

abilities.name: rattled
abilities.effect: Raises Speed one stage upon being hit by a dark, ghost, or bug move.
